column4: quick question only semi-related to Ubuntu, is there any obvious way of making wget perform a command upon completing a download i'm missing?
you can always put in at the end of your terminal command line.. wget bla bla bla bla ; echo Finished
I was hoping to do it through wget, but I suppose that will suffice.. thanks :)
well.. it's a workaround.. but I think it works.. there might be some wget voodoo you can do to make wget do it for you.. that program has so many switches and parameters it scares me =)
